page.title: 10Woodham Ferrers Food
page.content: The following extracts are taken from childrens' writings: My favourite food is chips. I prefer them bought in the shops. I like eating in restaurants, because of the waiters. I like most meats especially turkey. I like roast potatoes. I do not like ham. I like eating junk food such as hamburgers, hot dogs, sweets, coca cola, crisps and cakes. I also like Chinese food and curries. I like cereals like cornflakes, rice crispies, shreddies and Special K. I like honey, marmalade, strawberry jam and marmite on toast. I like sandwich spread. Favourite drinks are tizer, cherryade, orangeade, lemonade, apple and orange juice. I like the take aways from MacDonalds. For Sunday dinner we have roast meat, potatoes and vegetables. OT05720192
